bs-qr-code-extension-description: Displays a QR code with a link to the current page in the toolbar.
apihelp-bs-qr-code-summary: Get QR code as base64 data URI for a page
apihelp-bs-qr-code-param-revid: Revision id of the page to generate a permalink
apihelp-bs-qr-code-param-page: Page name of the page to generate base64 data URI
apihelp-bs-qr-code-example-bs-qr-code-wi: API call for a certain revid
bs-qr-code-tag-qrcode-desc: Embeds a linked QR code in wikipage
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-page-help: Page name to be included in the QR code link. To use the current page name, leave this field empty
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-query-help: Additional parameters to be added to the QR code URL. This include parameters like "action=edit" or "oldid=1"
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-desc-help: A description related to the QR code. To display only QR code, leave this field empty
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-help: Change the size of the embedded QR code
bs-qr-code-droplet-desc: Inserts a QR code in wikipage
